articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun at 00:00, Monday. the 62nd anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Kim Jong Un entered the hall where the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are standing.
					
					 The head of the guards of honor of the KPA Ground, Navy, Air and Anti-Air Force and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards made a salute towards the statues.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un was placed before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also laid before the statues was a floral basket in the name of the KPA.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, together with the visitors, paid high tribute to the statues.
					
					 He entered the hall of immortality where Kim Il Sung lies in state.
					
					 He, together with the visitors, paid homage to Kim Il Sung in the humblest reverence.
					
					 He went round the hall where orders Kim Il Sung received are on display and halls which house a train coach and car used by him.
					
					 Kim Jong Un entered the hall of immortality where Kim Jong Il lies in state.
					
					 He, together with visitors, paid homage to Kim Jong Il in the humblest reverence.
					
					 He went round the hall where orders Kim Jong Il received are on display, the mourners' hall and halls which house a car, electric car, boat and train coach used by him.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil, Kim Won Hong and other commanding officers of the KPA and those of the services and corps level units of the KPA.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Cemetery of CPV Martyrs
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Wreath to Cemetery of CPV Martyrs
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, sent a wreath to the cemetery of martyrs of the Chinese People's Volunteers (CPV) in Hoechang County, South Phyongan Province on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The wreath was placed there on Monday.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun to pay homage to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the 62nd anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Among them were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other senior officials of the party and state, the chairperson of a friendly party and members of the party central leadership organ in Pyongyang.
					
					 Seen before the statues of the great leaders were a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of the Korean People's Army was also seen.
					
					 Placed before the statues were a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the National Defence Commission, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the great leaders before the statues.
					
					 Then they entered the halls where the great leaders lie in state and made bows to them in humble reverence.
					
					 They went round rooms where orders the great leaders received are on display and rooms which house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign trips till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Martyrs' Cemeteries
Banquets Given for War Veterans
articles.content:
Banquets Given for War Veterans
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Banquets were given for the participants in the Fourth National Conference of War Veterans at the People's Palace of Culture, Okryu Restaurant, Chongryu Restaurant and the April 25 Hotel on Monday, the v-day.
					 Attending the banquets were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So and other officials, officials of the party and armed forces organs and officials concerned.
					
					 The participants in the conference were present on invitation.
					
					 The speakers warmly congratulated the veterans who took part in the conference thanks to the great trust and solicitude shown by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They said Kim Jong Un initiated the conference on the occasion of the v-day, attended the conference and congratulated war veterans and persons of wartime merits.
					
					 The social trait of respecting war veterans as the country's priceless treasures and defenders and preferentially treating them is prevailing in the DPRK, the speakers said.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will learn from the spirit of defending the country displayed by the war veterans and thus put an end to the confrontation with the U.S. and accomplish at any cost the historic cause of national reunification and build without fail the biggest power and the people's paradise looked up by the world on this land, they stressed.

articles.title: Floral Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Service personnel, working people of various strata, school youth and children visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the v-day.
					 Seen before the statues was a floral basket sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Laid before the statues were floral baskets in the name of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, institutions, enterprises, factories, farms and schools here, and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the great leaders before their statues.
					
					 Laid before the statutes and portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in various places of the city including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Military University, Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, Ministry of People's Security and the Mansudae Art Studio were floral baskets in the name of the units of the Korean People's Army, institutions and enterprises, and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Service personnel, working people, school youth and children across the country visited the statues and portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in their residential areas to pay tribute to the great leaders.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Liberian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Liberian President
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Sunday sent a message of greeting to Ellen Johnson Sirleaf, president of Liberia, on the occasion of its independence day.
					Expressing the conviction that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in various fields in the future, the message sincerely wished the president success in his work for national unity, socio-economic development and the welfare of its people.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Construction Site of Apartment Houses
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Construction Site of Apartment Houses
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju went to the Tongsan-dong area in Raknang District, Pyongyang to learn about the construction of apartment houses in the area along Ryongsong-Sopho-Ryokpho railway.
					 He stressed the need to push forward the construction of apartment houses from the stand of taking responsibility for the safety of the projects and guaranteeing their absolute quality for eternity.
					
					 Measures were taken to substantially provide building materials.
					
					 The premier also went round the Pyongyang Lift Factory and the Pyongyang Trolley Bus Factory.
					
					 He underlined the need for the factories associated with the leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il to step up the modernization of production processes, establish cultured practices in production and life and produce more lifts and trolley buses of new patterns.

articles.title: Fireworks Celebrate V-Day
articles.content:
Fireworks Celebrate V-Day
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Fireworks were displayed in Pyongyang on Monday, the 62nd anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 In the evening, people from all walks of life and school youth and children thronged the Mansu Hill where the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il stand, banks of the River Taedong, Panwol Islet, Okryu Bridge and other parts of the city to watch the display of fireworks of victory of Songun Korea.
					
					 At 23:00 fireworks were displayed all at once amid the playing of song "Holiday of Great War Victory", gorgeously decorating the nocturnal sky of Pyongyang.
					
					 Myriads of multi-color fireworks went off, working wonders.
					
					 The people looked back with deep emotion the feats and patriotic devotion made by Kim Il Sung who led the army and people to victory in the hard-fought battles and stern confrontation with the imperialists and feats and devoted efforts of Kim Jong Il who won one victory after another in the showdown with imperialism and the U.S.
					
					 Amid the playing of "Song of Pride of Guard Units" fireworks continued to be displayed, presenting fascinating and spectacular sceneries.
					
					 The fireworks display strikingly manifested the heroic spirit of the army and people of the DPRK dynamically advancing toward the final victory of the Juche revolution under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: War Victory Day Celebrated in DPRK
articles.content:
War Victory Day Celebrated in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- All the service personnel and people of the DPRK significantly celebrated the 62nd anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 A lot of people visited the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche, where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state, to pay tribute to them before the portraits depicting their beaming images.
					
					 Service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues of the great leaders on Mansu Hill in Pyongyang and other parts of the country to lay floral baskets and bouquets and pay tribute to them. 
					
					 Service personnel, working people and school youth and children visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and the Jonsung Revolutionary Museum and went to the statues and cemeteries of martyrs, towers and graves of fallen soldiers of the Korean People's Army in different parts of the country to pay tribute to the victors of the great age. 
					
					 Art performances were given to celebrate the v-day. 
					
					 Colorful acrobatic pieces were put on the stage at the Pyongyang Circus Theater.
					
					 Art performances were given in Jagang, North Phyongan, North Hwanghae, Kangwon and South Hamgyong provinces. The performers highly praised the noble exploits of Kim Il Sung and the high spirit of the service personnel and people who turned out in the all-people resistance for defending the country. 
					
					 People from all walks of life and school youth and children met with war veterans. 
					
					 Working people and school youth and children visited families of war veterans and honored disabled soldiers with bouquets, health foods, tonics and others to congratulate them on the holiday. 
					
					 Youth and students held dancing parties across the country.

articles.title: Participants in War Veterans Conference Call for Greeting July 27 of Final Victory
articles.content:
Participants in War Veterans Conference Call for Greeting July 27 of Final Victory
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 4th National Conference of War Veterans in an appeal on Monday called on all service personnel, people and youth to bring about July 27 of the final victory in the spirit of defending the country displayed in the 1950s.
					 Close at hand is the final decisive battle to settle accounts with the sworn enemy in the protracted showdown and have the flag of the Republic flying on the peak of a thriving nation, the appeal noted.
					
					 Calling for bringing about July 27 of the final victory in the spirit of defending the country displayed in the 1950s, it continued:
					
					 On behalf of the fighters on Wolmi Island who fought with only 4 artillery pieces against 50 000 enemy troops, the soldiers who destroyed themselves by jumping into the bottom of enemy tanks with grenades in their hands and the patriots who had smiles on their faces when they were standing on guillotines, shouting the slogan "Long Live General Kim Il Sung!" we ardently appeal to the rising generation:
					
					 Devotedly defend the headquarters of the revolution, the destiny and heart of the DPRK!
					
					 Deeply trust and follow only Comrade Kim Jong Un single-mindedly, not abandoning revolutionary faith though you may die!
					
					 All service personnel of the Korean People's Army!
					
					 Perform distinguished services in the great war for national reunification like the brave warriors in the days of the past war who dedicated themselves to defending the beloved motherland and become heroic guards who can stand proud before your hometowns, parents and teachers! 
					
					 Let all people!
					
					 Dedicate yourself to sprucing up your country to be more beautiful and stronger with your hearts burning with Kim Jong Il's patriotism, setting great store by this land defended and glorified by the President and leader Kim Jong Il throughout their lives!
					
					 We, war veterans, keenly experienced ourselves in the flames of the war the justice and might of our Party's theory of giving precedence to ideology that an egg can break a rock if it is equipped with idea.
					
					 As we had the death-defying spirit to defeat the enemy at any cost even by biting their throats, we shot down enemy planes with rifles and destroyed even a Yankee heavy cruiser that had boasted of being an "island" in the sea with torpedo boats.
					
					 We, Koreans, made even satellites and nuclear weapons by our own efforts.
					
					 Let's make the DPRK tower high over the world with our efforts and technology and resources!
					
					 The beloved young people who represent the strength and dynamism of the country!
					
					 The final victory like July 27 will belong to you. 
					
					 Don't forget even a moment with what enemy you are standing in confrontation!
					
					 The enemy are working hard to make the youngsters of the DPRK yield to them through the spread of corrupt bourgeois life style as they failed to influence the latter with gunfire. 
					
					 Launch a revolutionary ideological offensive to deter the imperialists' corrupt ideology and culture from infiltrating into this land!
					
					 Young people in the era of great Marshal Kim Jong Un should realize the cherished desire of the fellow countrymen and get the grudge of the nation settled!
					
					 We request you on behalf of your grandparents mercilessly killed by the enemy, our comrades-in-arms who failed to come back from the southern coast and all war veterans and all other Korean people:
					
					 When the time to launch a decisive battle comes, all young people across the country should turn out in a sacred war for reunifying the country to liberate the south at a breath and hoist the flag of the Republic on the top of Mt. Halla on Jeju Island!
					
					 Display fireworks for celebrating July 27, the day of final victory, on the day of making a report on national reunification to the great leaders after blowing up even the U.S., the citadel of aggression! 
					
					 Let all service personnel, people and youth wage a courageous and stubborn struggle by displaying the might of the great unity of the army and people rallied close around respected Comrade Kim Jong Un and in the spirit of defending the country dating back to the 1950s and thus usher in July 27, the day of the final victory, without fail and accomplish the great cause of Paektu!

articles.title: Brass Band Music and Wartime Song Contest Held
articles.content:
Brass Band Music and Wartime Song Contest Held
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- A contest of playing brass band music and singing wartime songs in chorus while marching in array were held by students here on Sunday at Kim Il Sung Square to celebrate the 62nd anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The contest began with "Song of General Kim Il Sung", the immortal revolutionary hymn. Numbers included prologue and grand chorus to the accompaniment of brass band music "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu" and serial wartime songs "Song of National Defence" and "To a Decisive Battle".
					
					 The performers highly praised the war victory exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung, invincible and iron-willed commander, who shattered the myth of the U.S. imperialists' "mightiness" and brought about the beginning of the ruin for them.
					
					 And a contest of singing wartime songs in chorus while marching in array took place amid the playing of song "Footstep".
					
					 The students marched past the square, loudly singing songs such as "Song of Coast Artillerymen" and "Advance and Advance".

articles.title: Performance Given by State Merited Chorus
articles.content:
Performance Given by State Merited Chorus
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the State Merited Chorus on Monday, the 62nd anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 Among the audience were Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil and other commanding officers of the Korean People's Army, the participants in the Fourth National Conference of War Veterans, service personnel, students, officials of the party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, persons of merits, overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations here and their wives, military attaches of foreign embassies here and their wives and foreign guests.
					
					 The performance started with a serial song "July 27, Our Victory Day". Put on the stage were such numbers as orchestra "Song of National Defence" and orchestra and male chorus "July 27 March".
					
					 The performers highly praised President Kim Il Sung for working unparalleled military miracles in the history of world wars by leading the army and people of the DPRK to victory with his Juche-oriented military idea, superb strategies and tactics and outstanding commanding art.
					
					 Male chorus and light music "Song of Proud Guards Units" revved up the atmosphere of the performance.
					
					 Also put on the stage were songs "Let's Not Abandon Revolutionary Faith Though One May Die" and "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu".

articles.title: Dancing Parties Celebrate V-Day
articles.content:
Dancing Parties Celebrate V-Day
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties were held by the youth and students across the country on Monday, the 62nd anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 At the venues of the dancing parties in the capital city of Pyongyang including the plaza of the Arch of Triumph and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, the youth and students danced to the tune of the cheerful song "July 27 March" and other songs in deep reverence for President Kim Il Sung, invincible and iron-willed commander, who brought about a brilliant victory in the war.
					
					 Similar dancing parties took place in provincial seats and cities and counties that day.
					
					 They fully demonstrated the revolutionary will and stamina of young vanguard determined to glorify the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea as grand revolutionary auspicious events and strikingly demonstrate the might of a youth power under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Camping Starts at Songdowon International Children's Camp
articles.content:
Camping Starts at Songdowon International Children's Camp
 Wonsan, July 27 (KCNA) -- A ceremony of receiving the 30th batch of campers took place at the Songdowon International Children's Camp on Monday.
					 Present there were officials concerned, camping groups of schoolchildren from the DPRK, Russia, Nigeria, Vietnam, Tanzania, Pakistan and Brazil and a camping group of children of Koreans in China.
					
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and made bows.
					
					 A congratulatory speech and a report were followed by speeches.
					
					 During the camping Korean and foreign schoolchildren will conduct multifarious activities including maritime sports, amusement games and operation of national days, having a pleasant time and deepening friendship.

articles.title: Egyptian Delegation Leaves for Home
articles.content:
Egyptian Delegation Leaves for Home
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Trade Union of Agriculture, Irrigation, Land Reclamation and Fishery of Egypt led by General Secretary Samy Mohamed Rezk Rezk went back home on Monday.

articles.title: Okayama Prefectural Delegation for Japan-Korea Friendship Leaves
articles.content:
Okayama Prefectural Delegation for Japan-Korea Friendship Leaves
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- An Okayama Prefectural delegation for Japan-Korea friendship led by Seisuke Mihara, representative of the Association for Promotion of Friendship between Japan and North and South Korea, went back home on Monday.

articles.title: Symbol of Eternal War Victory
articles.content:
Symbol of Eternal War Victory
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of servicepersons, working people, youth and students visits the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum on the occasion of the day of the Korean people's victory in the war (July 27, 1953).
					 What draw attention of visitors among exhibits are over 170 national flags of the DPRK.
					
					 Looking round those flags, visitors are recollecting with deep emotion the heroic feats performed by the army and people of the DPRK for the victory in the war by displaying the spirit of devotedly defending the leader, the Party and the country.
					
					 Holding high the flag, the Korean People's Army displayed unparalleled heroism and self-sacrificing spirit in every battlefield.
					
					 The flags got torn and faded are a witness to the popular heroism, the self-sacrificing spirit and the spirit of devotedly defending the country displayed by servicepersons during the war.
					
					 When visiting the museum in September Juche 99 (2010), supreme leader Kim Jong Un saw the bloodstained flag of a company of the Seoul Kim Chaek Guards 4th Infantry Division and highly praised the heroic feats performed by its soldiers.

articles.title: Loving Care for War Veterans Shown by Great Leaders
articles.content:
Loving Care for War Veterans Shown by Great Leaders
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The 4th National Conference of War Veterans took place here in the presence of supreme leader Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 62nd anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 At the conference, Kim Jong Un delivered a congratulatory speech, in which he highly praised war veterans as witnesses to the strength of heroic Korea and its history resplendent with victory, the country's priceless treasures representative of the era named after President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and heroes of our nation and genuine patriots who dedicated their youth and even their lives to defending the Party, the revolution, the country and the people. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung valued and held up the war veterans, who were trained and tested in the crucible of war, as the core of the Party and the revolutionary ranks.
					
					 Kim Jong Il in his lifetime took measures to call the historic 1st National Conference of War Veterans and build the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War on the bank of the Pothong River on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 He also put forward war veterans as lecturers of the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum and saw to it that heroic soldiers like Ri Su Bok and An Yong Ae, who sacrificed their only lives for the country, were buried in the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery to let them always live in the minds of the people.
					
					 Thanks to his noble moral obligation to war veterans, the social trait of respecting forerunners of the revolution and following their heroic fighting spirit prevails in the country.
					
					 Kim Jong Un are holding war veterans in high esteem as victors of great age, noting that he respects and values them as his grandfathers and fathers.
					
					 He also attended a banquet for war veterans to congratulate them and had a photo session with them.
					
					 Under his profound loving care, cemeteries of fallen fighters of the Korean People's Army (KPA) in different parts of the country were refined and the bases for the education in the tradition of victory, including the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum reconstructed to immortalize heroic feats performed by the KPA fighters in the period of the war.
					
					 Deeply moved by the loving care shown by the great leaders, the war veterans are fully determined to devote their all to the Party, the revolution, the country and the posterity.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Demands Release of Prisoners of Conscience
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Demands Release of Prisoners of Conscience 
Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The "Joint Action for Release of Prisoners of Conscience, Amnesty and Reinstatement" composed of 15 human rights organizations and civic and social organizations of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on July 24, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People. 
					 Noting that there are hundreds of prisoners of conscience who were detained under the false charges of violation of the "Security Law" and other evil laws against human rights, the body demanded the south Korean authorities release prisoners of conscience who launched actions for independence, democracy, peace and right to existence.

articles.title: Metal Trade Unionists of S. Korea Launch Hunger Strike
articles.content:
S. Korean Trade Union Members Launch Hunger Strike 
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Members of the Metal Workers Trade Union of south Korea turned out in the struggle in protest against the management side which violated the right to existence, according to the south Korean internet paper Chamsesang on July 23. 
					 The chief of the Kyongju branch and other leading members of the Metal Workers Trade Union went into a hunger strike in demand of regular payment of wages and guarantee of trade union activities. 
					
					 On July 22 the Kyongju branch held a meeting at which it declared that it would struggle until the management side meets the demand of the trade union.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Demands UNSC Probe Truth behind Anthrax Germ Case by U.S. Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Demands UNSC Probe Truth behind Anthrax Germ Case by U.S. Forces 
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNAD) -- The south Korean People's Team for Investigation into Anthrax Germ sent to the UN Security Council a letter of request demanding it probe the truth behind the introduction and experiments of anthrax germ by the U.S. forces in south Korea on July 23, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo. 
					 The fatal bio-chemical weapon was introduced into south Korea without informing the south Korean "government" of it, the letter said, calling for correctly probing the truth behind its introduction, processing, transporting and handling. 
					
					 The UNSC should thoroughly probe the truth behind the introduction of anthrax germ and details about the germ warfare experiments by the U.S. forces and launch extensive investigation into the work related to the U.S. development of bio-chemical weapons, the letter added.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Rejects U.S. False Report on Anthrax Germ Case
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Rejects U.S. False Report on Anthrax Germ Case
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean paper Hangyore on July 25 carried an editorial rejecting a U.S. false report on investigation into the truth about the introduction of anthrax germ.
					 The editorial said the Pentagon issued a report on investigation into the truth about the introduction of anthrax germ on July 23 but the contents were too poor and the attitude of the U.S. administration was irresponsible.
					
					 The U.S. introduction of anthrax germ and experiments are in violation of the treaty banning bio-chemical weapons and it is the war crime, the editorial said, adding that the U.S. forces' anthrax germ plan should be cancelled at once.

articles.title: S. Korean Broadcasting Service Denounces Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Broadcasting Service Denounces Japan
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The south Korean KBS denounced Japan for denying the past crimes of aggression.
					 Mitsubishi which actively backed Japan during the criminal Pacific war was reported to have said that it begs pardon to Americans, Britons and Australians who underwent forced labor during the war but Koreans are an exception.
					
					 The enterprise asserted that Koreans were mobilized under Japan's "General Mobilization Law", thereby justifying Japan's colonial rule of Korea, the broadcasting service said.
					
					 This proves once again that not only the Japanese government but civilian enterprises have no idea of reflecting of and apologizing for Japan's past history of aggression and the forced labor, it noted.
					
					 What's more, Japan has kept its far-fetched assertion for a decade in its defence white paper that Tok Islets belong to Japan, it said, adding it is brazen-faced to claim dominium over the islets.

articles.title: Bodies of DR Congo and Guinea Release Bulletins
articles.content:
Bodies of DR Congo and Guinea Release Bulletins
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Bodies of DR Congo and Guinea released bulletins from 16 to 18 on the occasion of the month of international solidarity with the Korean people.
					 The preparatory committee of DR Congo for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and liberation of Korea said in an article titled "The great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, defender of the Korean nation":
					
					 The Korean people highly laud the immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung who led the Fatherland Liberation War to victory on the occasion of the v-day.
					
					 Under his wise leadership the Korean people could win in the war.
					
					 The National Committee of DR Congo for the Study of the Juche Idea released similar article.
					
					 The Guinea-Korea Friendship Association said in an article titled "For independent and peaceful reunification of Korea":
					
					 President Kim Il Sung set forth the three charters for national reunification and leader Kim Jong Il provided north-south summits and made sure that the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration, a programme for implementing it, were adopted and published.
					
					 The driving force of Korea's reunification is all the Koreans in the north and the south and overseas.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities should immediately stop anti-DPRK nuclear war drills on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity.

articles.title: DPRK's Stand Supported by Nigerian Body
articles.content:
DPRK's Stand Supported by Nigerian Body
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on July 16 posted on its website an article supporting the statement of a spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK "False propaganda and fabrication are symptoms of those on their death-bed".
					 Denouncing the U.S. and its followers for recklessly painting the Pyongyang Bio-technical Institute, a base for scientific research and production of the DPRK, as the "latest facility for producing poisonous anthrax germs" and a "bio-weapons factory disguised as a non-governmental enterprise", the article continued:
					
					 To hatch plots and make fabrications are inveterate evil custom of the brigandish U.S. and its mode of existence. That's why it is keen on inciting hostility toward the DPRK, flatly denying the stark reality, though the U.S. committed indelible crimes against the Korean people.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is going reckless, buoyed by the U.S. smear campaign.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet group should know that with no plots and fabrications can it stem the strong trend of the era of independence and turn back the wheel of history.
					
					 Their plots and fabrications are no more than a poor farce of those without any basic understanding of the DPRK. So, they will surely go bankrupt.
					
					 Those who tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK by challenging the aspiration of all Koreans and going against the requirements of the times, justice and truth will have to pay a dear price for their crimes.

articles.title: Anniversary of Victory in Fatherland Liberation War Observed by DPRK Papers
articles.content:
Anniversary of Victory in Fatherland Liberation War Observed by DPRK Papers
 Pyongyang, July 27 (KCNA) -- Papers here today dedicate editorials to the 62nd anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. They call for steadily glorifying the history and tradition of the great war victory. 
					 Rodong Sinmun says that July 27 is the day of the second liberation when the army and people of the DPRK brought about the brilliant victory in the Fatherland Liberation War by defeating the U.S. imperialist aggressors who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It stresses that the victory in the war is one of the President's Juche- oriented military idea and outstanding strategies and tactics and one of the tremendous mental power of the Korean army and people who fought like heroes, united close around the party and the leader.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 More than six decades have passed since the fireworks of the victory in the war were displayed. Those days are shining as the history of pride in which the army and people of the DPRK achieved only victories in the confrontation with the U.S. imperialists and their followers under the leadership of Songun brilliant commanders of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The history and tradition of the war victory of Songun Korea are being given steady continuity on the road of advance in the new century of Juche.
					
					 These are the motive force enabling the army and people to open the fresh era of prosperity by their concerted efforts.
					
					 The paper calls upon all the service personnel and people to make dynamic advance along the road of final victory under the leadership of the great party while loudly singing the song "July 27 march".
					
					 Minju Joson says that the DPRK will always mark July 27 of victory as long as supreme leader Kim Jong Un, great Songun brilliant commander, leads the Korean revolution in the van and there are the invincible revolutionary Paektusan army and indestructible great unity between the army and the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 62o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito a la hora 0 del dia 27 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan para rendir el homenaje postumo al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Cuando entraba el Mariscal en el hall donde se encuentran las estatuas de pie del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, el jefe de la guardia de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC y del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino dio el parte de recepcion hacia las estatuas.
					
					Seguidamente, fueron colocados al pie de ellas un cesto de flores en nombre del Mariscal y el otro a nombre del EPC.
					
					El Marisca, junto con los participantes, rindio sublime homenaje a los grandes lideres ante sus estatuas de pie y en los salones de eternidad donde estan conservados sus cuerpos.
					
					Recorrio las salas de conservacion de las ordenes recibidas por el Presidente, un vagon de tren y un carro utilizados por el y las otras de conservacion de las ordenes recibidas por el Dirigente, el carro, coche electrico, barco y vagon de tren usados por el Dirigente y el halla de llantos.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So, Pak Yong Sik, Ri Yong Gil, Kim Won Hong y otros comandantes del EPC y los miembros de mando de las unidades de tipo de ejercito y a nivel de cuerpo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante cementerio de martires chinos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia ofrenda floral ante cementerio de martires chinos
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, envio una ofrenda floral ante el cementerio de los martires del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino en el distrito de Hoechang de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur, con motivo del 62o aniversario de la victoria en la gran Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria. 
					La ofrenda floral fue colocada el dia 27.

articles.title: Veteranos de guerra exhortan a traer 27 de julio de victoria final
articles.content:
Veteranos de guerra exhortan a traer 27 de julio de victoria final
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- Los participantes en la IV Conferencia Nacional de Veteranos hicieron publico el dia 27 un llamamiento exhortando a todos los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, habitantes y jovenes a traer el 27 de julio de la victoria final con el espiritu de defensa a la patria de la decada de 1950.
					Hoy, nuestra patria esta en visperas de la decisiva batalla final para saldar la cuenta general con los enemigos jurados con los que hemos venido confrontando de generacion en generacion y para poner la bandera nacional en la cima del Estado prospero, senala el documento.
					
					Enfatizando la necesidad de traer el 27 de julio de la victoria final con el espiritu de defensa a la patria manifestado en la decada de 1950, el llamamiento continua:
					
					Exhortamos fervientemente a los miembros de la nueva generacion con las voces de los soldados valientes de la isla Wolmi, quienes gritando "!Viva General Kim Il Sung!" rechazaron con 4 canones a 50 mil enemigos, los otros que se lanzaron con granadas bajo los tanques y los patriotas que fueron sonriendo al patibulo.
					
					!Defended a riesgo de la vida la Direccion de la Revolucion, destino y corazon de Corea!
					
					!Confiemos y sigamos absolutamente solo al camarada Kim Jong Un sin abandonar la conviccion revolucionaria aunque perdimos la vida!
					
					!Todos los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea!
					
					!Que sean soldados de guardia de corps y heroes dignos ante la tierra natal, padres y maestros al realizar brillantes meritos militares en la gran batalla de reunificacion de la patria, como los soldados valientes de tiempo de guerra quienes dedicaron hasta su vida a la patria!
					
					!Todo el pueblo!
					
					!Abrazad esta tierra defendida y glorificada por nuestro Lider y nuestro General dedicando toda su vida y lo hagan mas hermosa y mas fuerte con la vida ardiendo el corazon con el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il!
					
					En medio de las llamas de guerra nosotros, los veteranos de guerra experimentamos en carne propia la justeza y el poderio de la teoria ideologica de nuestro partido de que pueden  romper la roca con el huevo cargado de la idea.
					
					Por tener la decision de vida o muerte de vencer sin falta a los enemigos, pudimos abatir con rifle el avion y destruir con torpedero el crucero pesado norteamericano.
					
					Somos coreanos que fabricamos con propia fuerza el satelite artificial y el arma nuclear.
					
					!Pongamos a Corea sobre el mundo con las propias fuerzas, tecnologias y recursos!
					
					!Jovenes queridos, que son fuerza y juventud de la patria!
					
					El 27 de julio de la victoria final es precisamente de ustedes, jovenes.
					
					!No olvidad ni un momento con que enemigos se enfrentan ustedes!
					
					Los enemigos, que no pudieron vencer con fusil y canon a nuestra generacion, intentan ahora atentar con el sucio modo de vida burguesa a los miembros de la nueva generacion.
					
					!Que impidan con la revolucionaria ofensiva ideologica la penetracion de la cultura y ideologica corruptas de los imperialistas!
					
					!Jovenes, ustedes que son miembros de la epoca del gran Mariscal Kim Jong Un logren el deseo de los coreanos y desahoguen el resentimiento nacional!
					
					Les recomendamos en nombre de sus abuelos, matados salvajemente por los enemigos, nuestros companeros de arma que no regresaron de la orilla del Mar Sur, todos los veteranos de guerra y todos demas habitantes de Corea.
					
					!Jovenes de todo el pais, si llega el momento de batalla decisiva, se levanten como un solo hombre en la sagrada guerra de reunificacion de la patria y coloquen la bandera nacional en el monte Halla de la isla Jeju liberando de un tiron al terreno surcoreano!
					
					!Lanzad las salvas de celebracion del 27 de julio de la victoria final en aquel dia en que dedican a los grandes Lideres el parte de reunificacion de la patria, luego de aniquilar hasta a EE.UU., nido de agresion!
					
					!Todos los oficiales y soldados del EPC, habitantes y jovenes!
					
					!Acojamos sin falta el 27 de julio de la victoria final y llevemos a feliz termino la gran empresa de Paektu al luchar valiente y tesoneramente con el poderio de la gran unidad entre el ejercito y el pueblo, unidos monoliticamente en torno al querido camarada Kim Jong Un, con el espiritu de la defensa de la patria de la decada 1950!

articles.title: Cuadros rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Cuadros rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 62o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del Partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo y los miembros del organo de mando del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en esta capital visitaron el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan para rendir homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Ante las estatuas de pie de los grandes lideres estaba depositado un cesto de flores a nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					Tambien, se veia el otro a nombre del EPC. 
					
					Fue colocado un cesto de flores a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del PTC, el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC y el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC. 
					
					Los participantes rindieron sublime homenaje a los grandes lideres ante sus estatuas de pie y en los halles de eternidad donde estan conservados sus cuerpos.
					
					Luego, pasaron revista a las salas de conservacion de las ordenes, y las otras de carros, coche electrico, barco y vagones de tren usados por los grandes hombres hasta el ultimo periodo de sus vidas paras las visitas de orientacion y viajes al extranjero.

articles.title: Coreanos rinden homenaje a martires en dia de victoria en la Guerra
articles.content:
Coreanos rinden homenaje a martires en dia de victoria en la guerra
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 62o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, fueron colocadas este lunes las ofrendas florales ante el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong, el Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos y el Cementerio de Martires de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria.
					En esos lugares estaban colocadas las ofrendas florales enviadas por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					En las ceremonias de homenaje participaron Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, el Consejo de Ministros, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Fueron colocadas en el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong las ofrendas florales a nombres del Comite Central del PTC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC; en el Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos, una ofrenda floral a nombre comun de la Comision Militar Central del PTC, el Presidium de la APS de la RPDC y el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC; y en el Cementerio de Martires de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, una ofrenda floral a nombre comun del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del PTC y el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC.
					
					Tambien, fueron puestas las ofrendas florales a nombre del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, el Ministerio de Seguridad del Pueblo, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, unidades del EPC y del ESIPC, instituciones de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, organismos del partido y el poder, entidades de nivel urbano, fabricas y granjas de esta capital. 
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de los martires. 
					
					Este dia, las ceremonias de homenaje se realizaron tambien ante las estatuas de bronce, cementerios, monumentos y tumbas de martires en distintas localidades del pais.

articles.title: Ofrecidos banquetes por participantes en IV Conferencia Nacional de Veteranos
articles.content:
Ofrecidos banquetes por participantes en IV Conferencia Nacional de Veteranos 
Pyongyang, 27 de julio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria, tuvieron lugar este lunes en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo, los Restaurantes Okryu y Chongryu y el Hotel 25 de Abril los banquetes en honor de los participantes en la IV Conferencia Nacional de Veteranos. 
					Asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So y otros funcionarios de los organismos del partido y las fuerzas armadas y de las ramas interesadas. 
					
					Fueron invitados los participantes en la Conferencia. 
					
					Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju y Choe Ryong Hae pronunciaron los discursos. 
					
					Los oradores felicitaron calurosamente a los participantes en la IV Conferencia Nacional de Veteranos, celebrada por la gran confianza y amor del Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Mencionaron que el Mariscal propuso convocar la Conferencia Nacional de Veteranos con motivo del dia de la victoria en la guerra y asistio personalmente al conclave para felicitar a los veteranos y los ameritados del tiempo de guerra. 
					
					Dijeron que en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea los veteranos de guerra estan respetados como tesoros y salvadores del pais. 
					
					Enfatizaron que al seguir el espiritu de defensa de la patria, manifestado por los veteranos de guerra, los militares y civiles coreanos cumpliran a toda costa la historica causa de la reunificacion de la patria dando fin a la confrontacion antiyanqui y levantaran sin falta sobre el territorio patrio la mejor potencia, paraiso del pueblo al que admira todo el mundo.
